attributes.action: Reverse the legal definition of a woman to include Transgender women again.
attributes.additional_details:
Reversing equality laws on 'what a woman is' feels like a slippery slope back to discrimination and oppression of all women.
It opens the doors to asking the question where women deserve to be and puts into jeopardy any other minority's and their right to basic human rights, dignity and freedom of expression.
No woman is free until all women are free.
No man is going to put on an eleborate disguise to assult women, he does it anyway. Transgender women are not the problem.
attributes.background:
Include Trans women in the definition of a woman
Allow transgender women back into female spaces such as sports and bathrooms.
Stop male police officers strip searching women they see as transgender.
The legal definition changing doesnt just damage transgender women, all women's rights suffer.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Amend Equality Act to define the terms woman and man not based on biological sex
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725223

Review how the rights of trans athletes are respected in sports
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700219

Give trans people legal access to single-sex spaces of their acquired gender
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725515

Amend Law so Definitions of Man & Woman Include Transgender and Intersex People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725324
